Uses of Class
org.jsimpledb.core.Transaction

  • Packages that use Transaction 
    Package Description
    org.jsimpledb
    Abstraction layer allowing access to a Database using normal Java objects.
    org.jsimpledb.core
    Core classes for the JSimpleDB Java persistence layer.

    • Uses of Transaction in org.jsimpledb
